name: Gitlab dark aubergine
description: gitlab is the worst theme I've ever dealt with, they have nine million definitions of the color grey and none of them make the site look any better.  Time to ditch this awful theme and go aubergine
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("https://gitlab"),url-prefix("http://gitlab"),domain("gitlab.webhosting.coop"){a,body,html,li{background:#291129}.layout-nav,.nav-links,header.navbar-gitlab{border-bottom:1px solid #340034}a{color:#88F}table{background-color:transparent}body,html,li{color:#3c3}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#4F4}.badge{color:#3c3;background:#340034}.content-wrapper .container-fluid{background:#291129}.nav-links li a:active,.nav-links li a:focus,.nav-links li a:hover{color:#F3F;background:#115}header .header-content .title a{color:#3c3}header.navbar-gitlab{color:#3c3;background-color:#291129}.form-control,.search form,.select2-search{color:#3c3;background:#291129}.panel,.select2-drop{color:#2a2;background:#340034}code.key-fingerprint{color:#F3F;background:#151}button,input,optgroup,select,textarea{color:#2a2;background:#461146}.nav-links.sub-nav,.nav-links.sub-nav .container-fluid,header .global-dropdown-toggle{background-color:#291129}.layout-nav{background:#291129}header.navbar-gitlab .container-fluid .nav>li>a:active,header.navbar-gitlab .container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus,header.navbar-gitlab .container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover{color:#88F;background-color:#461146}header.navbar-gitlab .container-fluid .nav>li>a{color:#2a2;background-color:#291129}.axis,.branch-commit .commit-icon svg,.pika-next,.pika-prev,header.navbar-gitlab .container-fluid .nav>li>a svg,header.navbar-gitlab .container-fluid .nav>li>a:active svg,header.navbar-gitlab .container-fluid .nav>li>a:focus svg,header.navbar-gitlab .container-fluid .nav>li>a:hover svg{fill:#2a2}.dropdown-menu a,.dropdown-menu-nav a,.search .location-badge{color:#2a2;background-color:#461146}.dropdown-content,.dropdown-header,.dropdown-menu .dropdown-header,.dropdown-menu-nav .dropdown-header,.dropdown-menu-toggle,.dropdown-toggle{color:#3c3;background-color:#340034}.dropdown-menu a.is-focused,.dropdown-menu a:focus,.dropdown-menu a:hover,.dropdown-menu-nav a.is-focused,.dropdown-menu-nav a:focus,.dropdown-menu-nav a:hover{color:#F3F;background-color:#151}.btn,.btn:focus,.btn:hover,.group-buttons .btn,.project-repo-buttons .btn{color:#3c3;background-color:#340034;border-color:#461146}.group-buttons .count-with-arrow .count,.project-repo-buttons .count-with-arrow .count{color:#3c3;border-color:#461146;background:#340034}.git-clone-holder .form-control,.git-clone-holder .search form,.search .git-clone-holder form{background:#340034;font-size:14px;margin-left:-1px;cursor:auto;width:101%}.project-last-commit{background-color:#340034;border:1px solid #461146}.tree-holder .tree-table tr,.tree-item,.tree-item>tr:hover,tr.tree-item,tr.tree-item:hover{border-bottom:1px solid #291129;border-top:1px solid #291129}.commit-header,.row-content-block.content-component-block{background-color:#291129}.btn.btn-inverted.btn-remove:focus,.btn.btn-inverted.btn-remove:hover{background-color:#db3b21;border-color:#c0341d;color:#fff}.btn.btn-inverted.btn-remove{background-color:#291129;color:#db3b21;border-color:#db3b21}.sub-header-block{background-color:#340034;border-bottom:1px .fa-filter{background-color:#151;color:#F3F}.filtered-search-box{border:1px solid #151;background-color:#151}.file-title-flex-parent{background-color:#291129;border-bottom:1px solid #151}.description-block,.light-well{background-color:#461146;color:#2a2}.dropdown-menu-toggle,.dropdown-toggle{color:#3c3;background-color:#340034;border:1px solid .navbar-nav>.active>a:hover,header .global-dropdown-toggle:hover{color:#F3F;background:#151;border-color:#F3F}.navbar-default{background-color:#291129;border-color:#151}.panel-footer,hr{border-top:1px form,.top-area,.wiki-page-header,header.navbar-empty,ul.content-list>li{border-bottom:1px solid #151}.file-holder,.file-holder table tr td,.form-control,.md table tr td,.panel-default,.search
